Sooin

Korean: 수인

Group (2024-present):
MEOVV

Introduction

Sooin is a South Korean dancer and singer under The Black Label. She is the main dancer and sub vocalist of the South Korean girl group MEOVV.

On August 25, 2024, Sooin was revealed as the third member of MEOVV. The group officially debuted on September 6, 2024, with their debut digital single "MEOW".
